title: We're launching Fintech Pro to take you beyond the biggest finance headlines from insight to action
text:
Business Insider Intelligence is launching Fintech Pro, our newest resource for industry-changing fintech news and analysis.

Click here to join Fintech Pro.

The pace of financial services innovation has never been faster.

Disruptive upstarts are shooting to unprecedented scale across the banking, insurance, and payments industries, thanks to the confluence of new regulations, technologies, and consumer demands. Against this backdrop, fintech platform revenues are projected to surge to $638 billion in 2024, up from $263 billion in 2019, per Juniper Research.

To help incumbents, entrants, channel strategists, marketers, and analysts stay ahead of this complex and massive shift, Business Insider Intelligence is launching our newest coverage area: Fintech Pro.

Our Fintech Pro coverage gives industry-movers an edge with access to news, expert analysis, and insight from a community of the most important decision-makers shaping the future of financial services.

Here's why the industry's leading banks, insurers, wealth managers, fintechs, consultancies, and technology companies turn to our research to stay ahead of the next trends in fintech:
